root.name: Sports Party
root.description: IntroductionUbisofts' Sport party is first in the franchise of party games called "Play Zone", the game lets you play 9 different sports head to head or cooperative over 3 difficulty settings.The MinigamesThe 9 different sport mini-games you can play in Sports Party are:Basketball Cricket Badminton Darts Vollyball Midget Golf Horse shoe throwing
